TEI.2.document_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1922: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1928), 3 vols., Vol 2, pp. 374
TEI.2.document_title: Ramon Musquiz to Stephen F Austin, 05-13-1830

barker_notes.barker_summary: Ramon Musquiz to Austin, Bexar, May 13, 1830. Inclosing acknowledgment from Governor Viesca of receipt of Austin's map, which he will forward to federal authorities.
barker_notes.barker_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 2, pp. 374

text.body:
*div1 type="summary"* *p*Ramon Musquiz to Austin, Bexar, May 13, 1830. Inclosing acknowledgment from Governor Viesca of receipt of Austin's map, which he will forward to federal authorities.*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p**location_mentioned*Bexar*/location_mentioned*, *date_mentioned n="05-18-1830">May 18, 1830*/date_mentioned*.*/p* *p*See Calendar.*/p*
*/div1*
